column2: Pre-Pandemic","YO BK are not donation based, however they recommend new students take advantage of our 2 week trail for $89 . They have a third location in Wynwood, Miami. While this is not for the purposes of a local map, it is nice to mention. No Aerial Yoga in Williamsburg, just in Greenpoint Class format: In-person, On-Demand (no live classes). Outdoor classes have been held at multiple locations in the past. This summer it is the Box House Hotel.""",40.72342288893962,-73.95079220332944
